Code.Name: Rejected
Code.Description: Indication that the notice was not processed because of identified issues.

Code.Name: Accepted
Code.Description: Indication that the notice will be published at a certain time.

Code.Name: Conditionally accepted
Code.Description: Indication that the publication of the notice is done with warnings indicated in the message.

Code.Name: Published
Code.Description: Indication that the notice has been published at a certain time.
